h1_title: Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough
h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - The Duskveil
content: The good news is that his loud crow leaves enough time for you to interrupt the attack entirely by hitting him with a charged attack or Spirit Attack, cancelling the move entirely.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_4_Secret-Purple_Cloud_Mountain_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 4 Secret - Purple Cloud Mountain Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - The Duskveil'.
The content is as follows:
The good news is that his loud crow leaves enough time for you to interrupt the attack entirely by hitting him with a charged attack or Spirit Attack, cancelling the move entirely.
